summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Blended Face Setting Powder is a loose, lightweight powder for every skin type. Sets makeup; makes pores seem to disappear.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesClinique's signature, superfine loose powder creates a finish so smooth, flaws (and pores) seem to disappearLightweight, airy powder sets and perfects makeupSkin-hugging formula with a silky-smooth finish reflects light for extra radianceEffectively absorbs surface oilGives skin a fresh, natural lookDermatologist testedNon-acnegenicAllergy testedFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2153517How To UseApply loose setting powder after makeup.Invert powder canister and tap gently to allow powder to gather in tray.Dip Powder Brush (sold separately) in powder, gently tap off excess and apply to face.For the most flawless look, use Clinique's Powder Rubdown technique: Pour powder into palm of hand, coat fingertips with powder then gently pat and smooth fingertips over skin. Brush off excess.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Offâ„¢ Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.IngredientsMica, Nylon-12, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Silica, Calcium Stearate, Squalane, Kaolin, Magnesium Carbonate, Lauroyl Lysine, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499). .Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply loose setting powder after makeup.Invert powder canister and tap gently to allow powder to gather in tray.Dip Powder Brush (sold separately) in powder, gently tap off excess and apply to face.For the most flawless look, use Clinique's Powder Rubdown technique: Pour powder into palm of hand, coat fingertips with powder then gently pat and smooth fingertips over skin. Brush off excess.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Offâ„¢ Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.

reviews.headline: Wedding Bridesmaid Tested
reviews.comments: Terrific product! I wore this loose powder at a 13 hour wedding where it kept my makeup up all day and I had little to no oil issues. I usually like to look for deals or products on the cheaper side but I think this was definitely worth the splurge.

reviews.headline: I love this powder! So light
reviews.comments: I love this powder! I have used it for years but didn't realize Ulta didnt provide brush like Clinique did

reviews.headline: This powder is amazing.
reviews.comments: This powder is amazing. If you are looking for an invisible powder, buy this one. It doesn't stick in lines and it blurs out all imperfections.

reviews.headline: Flawless
reviews.comments: this powder works amazing! my face has never looked so flawless. I do still get oily, but it's way later in the day, like maybe after 5 hours of my makeup being on. highly recommend if ur looking for a nice setting powder.

reviews.headline: I will continue buying.
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for a long time and I will continue to do so.

reviews.headline: Tinted
reviews.comments: It's a really nice powder with good texture for a pretty good value when you do the math. Unfortunately, there's no truly colorless option.

reviews.headline: Clinique setting powder
reviews.comments: This is a great setting powder, i highly tecommend it. I get alot of compliments on my makeup. I modtly use Clinque products.

reviews.headline: Clinique setting powder
reviews.comments: This is a great setting powder, i highly tecommend it. I get alot of compliments on my makeup. I modtly use Clinque products.

reviews.headline: Won't settle in creases
reviews.comments: I this power every day for work, I put it on my eyelids, under my eyes with an eyeshadow brush and all over my face with a big fluffy brush. I ran out so I decided to replace it for what I already had in my cabinet which was MAC pressed powder - it was fine for my face but by lunch time it was noticeably settled in my top and bottom eye creases, then I tried bareMinerals, my favorite for my face! And the same! It settled in my top and bottom eye creases ugh! And I'm not about to add primero or any extra steps to my basic everyday work makeup routine, so I repurchased clinique loose powder and voilÃ  no creasing, simple and easy is what I need! Thank you Clinique!

reviews.headline: I will definitely be buying this product again.
reviews.comments: I absolutely adore this facial powder. I have been looking for something that is lightweight and will last for a long period of time. They offer a good selection of colors to choose from. The only downfall about this product is getting the powder to dump into the lid.

reviews.headline: Disappointed in the product "makeover"
reviews.comments: I too have used this product for years.  Took my new container out I had in reserve to compare to the one that's almost empty.  Looks identical, until...it isn't.  It's missing the brush and the size Shrunk like  29%. It went from 35 grams to 25 grams.  The container is deceiving and looks similar until you look at the label on the bottom which shows the  disparity.  And the price is the same for less product.  It's just disappointing.

reviews.headline: Long time user
reviews.comments: I've used this product for over 30 years. It's the best.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Use Dailey as makeup finishing.touch.

reviews.headline: Absolutely
reviews.comments: I have used Clinique products for many years.  To be perfectly honest I have waivered to a few well known products.   But I have always returned to Clinique..  Sandra Iler Grohnke

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way
reviews.comments: It works and it matches my skin well despite me getting a color that was slightly over what I needed (Transparency 3 instead of 2 or Neutral)! You don't need to use very much at all.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: I like this product.  The foundation to match is great as well.

reviews.headline: Personal favorite
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin with concern about large pores. This powder is very fine and feels light and smooth while giving beautiful coverage. It doesn't settle in my pores, and makes my skin look nice. It's my absolute favorite face powder.

reviews.headline: Been using for years
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love it so much it's an amazing product and a very beautiful long wear, a 10 out of 10 ðŸ™Œ

reviews.headline: invisible blend??
reviews.comments: this is the complete opposite of invisible on my skin. i am very fair skinned and this powder is several shades darker than my face and its visibly obvious when i put it on. definitely not invisible.

media.headline: It's pricey but I will continue to buy. Thanks to consultant
media.caption: I love clinic and at 60 years old I feel amazingly beautiful

media.headline: Love this loose powder
media.caption: No shine! Just smooth soft skin

media.headline: I would keep buying this product. Love it!!!
Icing for my face
media.caption: my daughters and grandaughters all use C

faceoff_positive.comments: This powder beats all other powders for me as it's quite sheer, sets my foundation without turning cakey, and doesn't give my fair skin an orange cast.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Powder

faceoff_negative.comments: One of the ladies who worked in Ulta recommended this product to me and said it was the best, and I'm honestly very disappointed with this product. Not only did it not match my skin while giving me patches on my face, it also made my skin look and feel old. Never ever again will I be buying this product. Ever. STICK TO THEIR SKIN CARE PRODUCTS!
faceoff_negative.headline: Caked up
